member.name: T:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.AgriculturalUsesDataTests
member.summary: This section contains the tests for loading agricultural use data. This includes the checks for correct loading of the tables, as well as the tests for the processing of the raw agricultural use data into weighted and compound based agricultural use percentages. All tests use the the data file DataGroupsTests.mdb. A description of the agricultural use data is provided in the validation data description document.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.AgriculturalUsesDataTests.AgriculturalUsesTestWeightedUseGroupFractions
member.summary: Tests the general weighted agricultural use fractions for each of the agricultural use groups for the foods apple, bananas, and pineapple. I.e., the weighted (location- aggregated) percentage of agricultural use for the groups A, AB, and ABC. UseAgriculturalUseTable = true, UseAgriculturalUsePercentage = true, SetMissingAgriculturalUseAsUnauthorized = true.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.AgriculturalUsesDataTests.AgriculturalUsesTestApple
member.summary: Tests correct processing of agricultural uses for the food apple, and compounds A, B, C, and D. Tests the weighted agricultural use percentages per substance, per location and tests the aggregated (over all locations) weighted agricultural use percentage. UseAgriculturalUseTable = true, UseAgriculturalUsePercentage = true, SetMissingAgriculturalUseAsUnauthorized = true.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.AgriculturalUsesDataTests.AgriculturalUsesTestBananas
member.summary: Tests correct processing of agricultural uses for the food bananas, and compounds A, B, C, and D. Tests the weighted agricultural use percentages per substance, per location and tests the aggregated (over all locations) weighted agricultural use percentage. UseAgriculturalUseTable = true, UseAgriculturalUsePercentage = true, SetMissingAgriculturalUseAsUnauthorized = true.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.AgriculturalUsesDataTests.AgriculturalUsesTestPineapple
member.summary: Tests correct processing of agricultural uses for the food pineapple, and compounds A, B, C, and D. Tests the weighted agricultural use percentages per substance, per location and tests the aggregated (over all locations) weighted agricultural use percentage. UseAgriculturalUseTable = true, UseAgriculturalUsePercentage = true, SetMissingAgriculturalUseAsUnauthorized = true.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.AgriculturalUsesDataTests.AgriculturalUsesTestAppleMissingAuthorized
member.summary: Tests correct processing of agricultural uses for the food apple, and substances A, B, C, and D. Tests the weighted agricultural use percentages per substance, per location and tests the aggregated (over all locations) weighted agricultural use percentage. UseAgriculturalUseTable = true, UseAgriculturalUsePercentage = true, SetMissingAgriculturalUseAsUnauthorized = false.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.AgriculturalUsesDataTests.AgriculturalUsesTestBananasMissingAuthorized
member.summary: Tests correct processing of agricultural uses for the food bananas, and substances A, B, C, and D. Tests the weighted agricultural use percentages per substance, per location and tests the aggregated (over all locations) weighted agricultural use percentage. UseAgriculturalUseTable = true, UseAgriculturalUsePercentage = true, SetMissingAgriculturalUseAsUnauthorized = false.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.AgriculturalUsesDataTests.AgriculturalUsesTestPineappleMissingAuthorized
member.summary: Tests correct processing of agricultural uses for the food pineapple, and compounds A, B, C, and D. Tests the weighted agricultural use percentages per substance, per location and tests the aggregated (over all locations) weighted agricultural use percentage. UseAgriculturalUseTable = true, UseAgriculturalUsePercentage = true, SetMissingAgriculturalUseAsUnauthorized = false.

member.name: T:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.CompoundsDataTests
member.summary: Contains the tests for loading compounds data. All tests use the the data file DataGroupsTests.mdb. A description of the substance data is provided in the validation data description document.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.CompoundsDataTests.CompoundsDataTest1
member.summary: Tests correct loading of the substances. Validation check: assert that the expected compounds are present in the substances of the compiled datasource and no other compounds exist in the compiled datasource.

member.name: T:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.ConcentrationsDataTests
member.summary: This sections contains the tests for loading data from the concentrations data group. These tests are designed to test whether the concentration data is loaded correctly into the system, and the wrapper classes are constructed appropriately. All tests use the the data file DataGroupsTests.mdb. A description of the concentration data is provided in the validation data description document.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.ConcentrationsDataTests.ConcentrationsDataTests1
member.summary: Tests correct loading of the samples. Verification by counting the samples for the foods apple (=5), bananas (=5), and pineapple (=10) of the compiled datasource generated with the specified concentration data.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.ConcentrationsDataTests.ConcentrationsDataTest2
member.summary: Test correct loading of the analytical methods and the substance specific details of the analytical methods (analytical methods - substances). Verification by counting the analytical methods (=5), and the number of samples per analytical method (AM1 = 5, AM2 = 5, AM3 = 1, AM4 = 3, and AM5 = 6).

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.ConcentrationsDataTests.ConcentrationsDataTest3
member.summary: Test correct loading of the analytical methods and the compound specific details of the analytical methods (analytical methods - compounds). The analytical methods per compound (A = 5, B = 2, C = 2, D = 3).

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.ConcentrationsDataTests.ConcentrationsDataTest4
member.summary: Test creation of sample substance records for the foods apple, pineapple, and bananas and the compounds A, B, C, and D. Verification by counting per food/compound combination, the number of missing values, non-detects, and positives.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.ConcentrationsDataTests.ConcentrationsDataTest5
member.summary: Test creation of substance residue collections for the foods apple, pineapple, and bananas and the substances A, B, C, and D. Verification by checking per food/compound combination, the number of residues, the number of non-detects, the number of positives, and the fraction of positives.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.ConcentrationsDataTests.ConcentrationsDataTest6
member.summary: Test creation of substance residue collections through a sample substance record collection for the foods apple, pineapple, and bananas and the compounds A, B, C, and D. Verification by checking per food/compound combination, the number of residues, the number of non-detects, the number of positives, and the fraction of positives.

member.name: T:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.ConsumptionsDataTests
member.summary: This sections contains the tests for loading data from the consumptions data group. These tests are designed to test whether the consumption data is loaded correctly into the system. This is done by generating a compiled data source based on the specified data source and performing the tests on the compiled data source. The compiled data source is generated from the raw data file DataGroupsTests.mdb. A description of the consumption data is provided in the validation data description document.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.ConsumptionsDataTests.TestLoadFoodSurveys
member.summary: Tests correct loading of the food surveys. Verification by checking the expected food surveys of the compiled data source ("ValidationSurvey" and "EmptySurvey").

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.ConsumptionsDataTests.TestLoadConsumptions
member.summary: Tests correct loading of the consumptions. Verification by counting the consumptions per food. Counts: apple (=17), bananas (=7), and pineapple (=3).

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.ConsumptionsDataTests.TestLoadIndividuals
member.summary: Tests correct loading of the individuals. Verification by counting the individuals. Expected: 10 individuals.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.ConsumptionsDataTests.TestLoadIndividualProperties
member.summary: Tests correct loading of the individual properties. Verification by checking the co-factor and co-variate properties. Co-factors: "Age", "Gender", "ExtraCofactor", and "ExtraCovariable". Co-variate: "Age" and "ExtraCovariate".

member.name: T:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.EffectsDataTests
member.summary: Contains the tests for loading effects data. All tests use the the data file DataGroupsTests.mdb. A description of the effects data is provided in the validation data description document.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.EffectsDataTests.EffectsDataTest1
member.summary: Tests correct loading of the effects. Validation check: assert that the expected effects are present in the effects of the compiled datasource and no other effects exist in the compiled datasource.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.EffectsDataTests.EffectsDataTest2
member.summary: Tests correct loading of the relative potency factors. Validation check: assert that the expected compounds of the effect exist and no other compounds exist in the effects.

member.name: T:MCRA.EntityModels.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.SimulationInputDataTests.FocalFoodsTests
member.summary: This section contains the tests for validating the focal foods data input mechanism. It is tested using a base database, and a concentrations database (in tabulated form). All tests use the the base data file DataGroupsTests.mdb. All tests use the the focal foods data file TabulatedConcentrationsDataTests.mdb.

member.name: M:MCRA.EntityModels.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.SimulationInputDataTests.FocalFoodsTests.FocalFoodsTest1
member.summary: Replace the concentrations of for Apple with the concentrations from the focal foods database. Verify that for apple, the sample counts match those of the focal foods database for Apple, and that for the other foods, the counts match the concentrations of the base database.

member.name: T:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.FoodEx2DataTests
member.summary: This sections contains the tests for loading data from a data source in which the foods and consumptions are coded in FoodEx2 format. These tests are designed to test whether FoodEx2 coded data is loaded correctly into the system. All tests use the the data file FoodEx2Tests.mdb.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.FoodEx2DataTests.FoodEx2DataTest_Foods
member.summary: Tests correct loading of FoodEx2 coded foods.

member.name: T:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.FoodsDataTests
member.summary: This sections contains the tests for loading data from the foods data group. These tests are designed to test whether the foods data is loaded correctly into the system. All tests use the the data file DataGroupsTests.mdb. A description of the foods data is provided in the validation data description document.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.FoodsDataTests.FoodsDataTest_Foods
member.summary: Tests correct loading of the foods. Verification by making sure that only the expected foods are part of the foods of the compiled datasource.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.FoodsDataTests.FoodsDataTest_FoodProperties
member.summary: Tests correct loading of the food properties. Verification by checking the expected properties for the foods with properties (unit weight for the foods apple, bananas, and pineapple) and test for no properties on the other foods in the compiled datasource.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.FoodsDataTests.FoodsDataTest_MarketShares
member.summary: Tests correct loading of the food market shares. Verification by checking the that the expected market shares exist in the compiled datasource, and no other market shares exist.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.FoodsDataTests.FoodsDataTest_FoodTranslations
member.summary: Tests correct loading of the food translations. Verification by checking that the expected translations exist in the compiled data source, and no other food translations exist.

member.name: T:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.MaximumResidueLimitsDataTests
member.summary: Contains the tests for loading maximum residue llimits data. All tests use the the data file DataGroupsTests.mdb. A description of the maximum residue limits data is provided in the validation data description document.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.MaximumResidueLimitsDataTests.MaximumResidueLimitsDataTest1
member.summary: Tests whether the maximum residue limits table is correctly loaded. Checks for each food and compound whether the expected MRL is present. Also checks whether no other MRLs are loaded.

member.name: T:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.NonDietaryDataTests
member.summary: This sections contains the tests for loading data from the non-dietary data group. These tests are designed to test whether the concentration data is loaded correctly into the system, and the wrapper classes are constructed appropriately. All tests use the the data file DataGroupsTests.mdb. A description of the concentration data is provided in the validation data description document.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.NonDietaryDataTests.NonDietaryDataTests1
member.summary: Check the nominal non-dietary exposures of non-dietary survey 1 with unmatched individual exposures.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.NonDietaryDataTests.NonDietaryDataTests2
member.summary: Check the nominal non-dietary exposures of non-dietary survey 2 with matched individual exposures.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.NonDietaryDataTests.NonDietaryDataTests3
member.summary: Check the nominal non-dietary exposures of non-dietary survey 3 with matched individual exposures.

member.name: T:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.ProcessingFactorsDataTests
member.summary: This sections contains the tests for loading data from the processing factors group. These tests are designed to test whether the processing factors data is loaded correctly into the system. All tests use the the data file DataGroupsTests.mdb. A description of the processing factors data is provided in the validation data description document.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.ProcessingFactorsDataTests.ProcessingFactorsDataTest1
member.summary: Tests correct loading of the processing types. Verification by making sure that only the expected processing types exist in the compiled datasource. Check total count and assert presence of each of the processing types through the processing type code.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.ProcessingFactorsDataTests.ProcessingFactorsDataTest2
member.summary: Tests correct loading of the processing factors. Verification by making sure that only the expected processing factors exist in the compiled datasource. Check total count and assert presence of each of the processing types through the processing type code.

member.name: T:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.SSDConcentrationsTests
member.summary: This sections contains the tests for loading concentration and compound data from and SSD file. These tests are designed to test whether this data is loaded correctly into the system. All tests use the the SSD data file SSDConcentrationsTestBase.mdb and uses a base data file for the other data groups SSDConcentrationsTestBase.mdb.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.SSDConcentrationsTests.TestSSDCompounds
member.summary: Tests correct loading of the compounds. Verification by counting the compounds of the compiled datasource.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.SSDConcentrationsTests.TestSSDAnalyticalMethods
member.summary: Tests correct loading of the analytical methods. Verification by checking that only the expected analytical methods are part of the analytical methods of the compiled datasource.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.SSDConcentrationsTests.TestSSDAnalyticalMethodCompounds
member.summary: Tests correct loading of the compound information per analytical methods. Verification by counting the number of substance per analytical method of the compiled datasource.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.SSDConcentrationsTests.TestSSDSamples
member.summary: Tests correct loading of the samples. Verification by counting the samples of the compiled datasource.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.SSDConcentrationsTests.TestSSDConcentrations
member.summary: Tests correct loading of the concentrations. Verification by checking the samples foor food P0110010A and compound RF-0087-001-PPP, checking the number of positive concentrations and the total number of samples for this food/compound combination.

member.name: T:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.TabulatedConcentrationsDataTests
member.summary: This sections contains the tests for loading tabulated concentration data. These tests are designed to test whether the concentration data is loaded correctly into the system, and the wrapper classes are constructed appropriately. All tests use the the data file DataGroupsTests.mdb. A description of the concentration data is provided in the validation data description document.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.TabulatedConcentrationsDataTests.TabulatedConcentrationsDataTest1
member.summary: Test compound residue collections and sample compound collections generated for the food apple and the compounds A, B, C, and D. For the compound residue collections, validate the number of residues, the number of positives, and the number of non-detects. For the sample compound records, test the missing value counts.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.TabulatedConcentrationsDataTests.TabulatedConcentrationsDataTest2
member.summary: Test compound residue collections generated through the sample compound records for the food apple and the compounds A, B, C, and D.

member.name: T:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.UnitVariabilityFactorsDataTests
member.summary: This sections contains the tests for loading data from the unit variability factors group. These tests are designed to test whether the unit variability factors data is loaded correctly into the system. All tests use the the data file DataGroupsTests.mdb. A description of the unit variability factors data is provided in the validation data description document.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.UnitVariabilityFactorsDataTests.UnitVariabilityFactorsDataTest1
member.summary: Tests correct loading of the unit variability factors by counting the number of unit variability factors loaded from the data and counting the unit variability factors linked to each food, compound and processingtype.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.CompiledDataSourceTests.UnitVariabilityFactorsDataTests.UnitVariabilityFactorsDataTest2
member.summary: Tests correct loading of the unit variability factors. Tests correct values of the factor, coefficient, and units in composite sample fields.

member.name: T:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.SimulationInputDataTests.IndividualSubsetSelectionTests
member.summary: This section contains tests for validating that individual subset selections are processed correctly. All tests use the the data file SubsetSelectionTests.mdb.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.SimulationInputDataTests.IndividualSubsetSelectionTests.AllIndividualProperties
member.summary: Test whether the properties that are defined for the individuals are loaded correctly.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.SimulationInputDataTests.IndividualSubsetSelectionTests.CovariableIndividualProperties
member.summary: Test whether the properties that are defined for the individuals are loaded correctly.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.SimulationInputDataTests.IndividualSubsetSelectionTests.IndividualSubsetSelectionNoSubset
member.summary: Verify that the selected subset of individuals yields all individuals in case that there are no subsets.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.SimulationInputDataTests.IndividualSubsetSelectionTests.IndividualAgeSubsetSelectionTest1
member.summary: Make an age subset definitions and verify that the counts of the selected individuals match the expected counts for the specified subsets. Test an age subset definition that yields an empty subset.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.SimulationInputDataTests.IndividualSubsetSelectionTests.IndividualAgeSubsetSelectionTest2
member.summary: Make an age subset definitions and verify that the counts of the selected individuals match the expected counts for the specified subsets. Test an age subset definition based on a non-empty interval.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.SimulationInputDataTests.IndividualSubsetSelectionTests.IndividualAgeSubsetSelectionTest3
member.summary: Make an age subset definitions and verify that the counts of the selected individuals match the expected counts for the specified subsets. Test an age subset definition based on a lower bound definition.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.SimulationInputDataTests.IndividualSubsetSelectionTests.IndividualAgeSubsetSelectionTest4
member.summary: Make an age subset definitions and verify that the counts of the selected individuals match the expected counts for the specified subset. Test an age subset definition based on an upper bound definition.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.SimulationInputDataTests.IndividualSubsetSelectionTests.IndividualGenderSubsetSelectionTest1
member.summary: Make a gender subset definition and verify that the counts of the selected individuals match the expected counts for the specified subset. Test the gender subset definition that yields an empty subset.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.SimulationInputDataTests.IndividualSubsetSelectionTests.IndividualGenderSubsetSelectionTest2
member.summary: Make a gender subset definition and verify that the counts of the selected individuals match the expected counts for the specified subset. Test the gender subset definition that yields all individuals.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.SimulationInputDataTests.IndividualSubsetSelectionTests.IndividualGenderSubsetSelectionTest3
member.summary: Make a gender subset definition and verify that the counts of the selected individuals match the expected counts for the specified subset. Test the gender subset definition for only the males.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.SimulationInputDataTests.IndividualSubsetSelectionTests.IndividualGenderSubsetSelectionTest4
member.summary: Make a gender subset definition and verify that the counts of the selected individuals match the expected counts for the specified subset. Test the gender subset definition for only the females.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.SimulationInputDataTests.IndividualSubsetSelectionTests.IndividualAgeGenderSubsetSelectionTest
member.summary: Make age and gender subset definitions and verify that the counts of the selected individuals match the expected counts w.r.t. the specified subsets.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.SimulationInputDataTests.IndividualSubsetSelectionTests.IndividualFoodAsEatenSubsetSelectionTest
member.summary: Make a gender subset selection and verify that the foods as eaten and foods as measured don't include foods that are not consumed by the individuals of the subset. Verification by means of comparing counts of the foods as eaten/measured with the expected counts.

member.name: T:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.SimulationInputDataTests.SimulationInputDataSourceTests
member.summary: This section contains tests for the simulation input data source. That is, the container object that is provided to the simulation module to perform the assessment simulations. These tests check (on a high level) whether the input data for the simulation is correctly gathered. These tests use the the data file SimulationInputDataSourceTests.mdb.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.SimulationInputDataTests.SimulationInputDataSourceTests.SimulationInputDataSourceTest1
member.summary: Tests whether the conversion results in the generated simulation input data source are as expected by counting the foods as eaten, foods as measured, and conversion results.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.SimulationInputDataTests.SimulationInputDataSourceTests.SimulationInputDataSourceTest2
member.summary: Tests whether the individuals and consumptions in the generated simulation input data source are as expected by counting the individuals, individual days, the consumptions per food-as-eaten, and the consumptions per food-as-measured.

member.name: T:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: This section contains integration tests, for validating the interaction between multiple parts of the system.

member.name: T:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: This section contains data integrity tests, for validating correct processing of input data.

member.name: T:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.SimulationInputDataTests.FocalFoodEatersTests
member.summary: This section contains tests for validating that focal food eaters are correctly identified and filters on consumption days are correctly applied when gathering the simulation input data. All tests use the the data file DataGroupsTests.mdb.

member.name: M:MCRA.Test.IntegrationTests.DataIntegrityTests.SimulationInputDataTests.FocalFoodEatersTests.FocalFoodEatersTestsTest1
member.summary: This test makes a food as measured subset selection on APPLE using ConsumerDaysOnly = true, and TreatFoodSubsetAsFocalFoodEatersConcept = true. Verify that with this option, also the other foods containing compound A are marked as food as measured when they are eaten by a person who has consumed APPLE. Verify that only the individuals that have consumed APPLE are included in the simulation input data.
